pages.text: I'm not sure how I overlooked such an obvious thing to try, but sprinkling salis mundus onto a block of soulium causes it to collapse. What remains is... I don't even know where to start with describing... 'them'. However, experimenting with them has shown that they will be incredibly useful in progressing my research.

To make use of their power, one must offer up specific items to them, then initiate the deal by feeding them a soul. If they accept the offering, they will summon a being of ethereal nature for you. I have not yet documented all of them, but there is one exchange that is of great interest to me.
